name: DiningBuddy
body:
## Dining Buddy
DiningBuddy is a social dining experiment created for Christopher Newport University.

This app uses the location features of smartphones to determine how crowded CNU's dining halls are at any given time. Additionally, users of the app can anonymously share what they see when they head to eat so that others know what to expect, and the menus and hours of the dining halls.

## Activity
### Regattas
![Regattas Activity Graph](https://api.gravitydevelopment.net/cnu/api/v1.0/graphs/Regattas/)
### Commons
![Regattas Activity Graph](https://api.gravitydevelopment.net/cnu/api/v1.0/graphs/Commons/)
### Einstein's
![Regattas Activity Graph](https://api.gravitydevelopment.net/cnu/api/v1.0/graphs/Einsteins/)

## Get the App
You can download DiningBuddy for [iPhone](http://google.com) or [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.gravitydevelopment.cnu).

## Get Support
Please contact me with any issues you discover when using the app: I'm open to all suggestions and feedback.
You can reach me by email ( ad@mfendley.com ) or on twitter ( @gravity_low ).

You can also discuss the service on CNU's subreddit: http://www.reddit.com/r/CNU/
